name: Deivanayagi Udayakumar
category: Real Estate Services > Residential Real Estate Agent
my_business: We DEIVINCE are the exclusive  marketing channel partner for SUKRA Developers & Energy Living Scapes who constructs premium apartments in prime locations around Coimbatore, Madurai & Kodaikanal.
top_product: Assisting with Home Buying and Selling Property Investment Guidance Land Purchase for Residential Development Property Legal and Documentation Assistance Residential Project Consultation
ideal_referral: The ideal referral for residential real estate is someone who is ready to buy or sell a home or is in a life situation that often leads to a real estate transaction. These could include: First-time Homebuyers: Individuals or couples looking to purchase their first home. Growing Families: Families needing more space and looking to upgrade to a larger home. Empty Nesters/Downsizers: Older individuals or couples who no longer need a large home and are looking to downsize. Relocating Professionals: People moving to a new area for work who need to buy or sell their home. Investors: Real estate investors looking to buy residential properties for rental income or to flip for profit. Renters Ready to Buy: Individuals who have been renting but are now in a position to purchase a home. Divorcing Couples: Those who may need to sell their home as part of a divorce settlement. People Going Through Life Changes: Individuals experiencing events like marriage, having children, retirement, or other life changes that require a change in living situation. Heirs: People who have inherited property and are looking to sell or manage the real estate.
top_problem_solved: A client from Tanzania was struggling to sell his newly built apartment in Madurai more than a year due to a lack of local market insight and support. Through BNI, I got connected with him and, along with my marketing team, we strategized and executed a targeted campaign. We handled everything from listing to lead management, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free selling experience — even from overseas. The property was sold successfully, proving the power of BNI and the right network.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my most memorable experiences through BNI was helping a client from Tanzania sell his apartment in Madurai. He had no local support and was finding it difficult to market the property effectively. Thanks to a connection I made through BNI, I got the opportunity to assist him. With my marketing team’s efforts, we created a strategy that attracted the right buyers and closed the deal smoothly — all while he was overseas. It reminded me how powerful this network really is — not just in generating business, but in building trust across borders.
